product_name: Nite Ize 1 Watt LED Upgrade - 2 - 6 C or D Cell
long_description: The Nite Ize 1 Watt LED upgrade kit converts most C- and D-cell incandescent flashlights (sold separately) into a bright, energy-efficient LED flashlight by simply swapping out the bulb. LED emits pure white light to illuminate the darkest reaches of the trail. Efficient LED technology will save you money on batteries, and the LED itself is rated to 50,000 hrs. of use. Nite Ize 1 Watt LED upgrade kit is simple to install.
short_description: The Nite Ize 1 Watt LED upgrade kit converts most C- and D-cell incandescent flashlights (sold separately) into a bright, energy-efficient LED flashlight by simply swapping out the bulb.
